name: Consent and proxies of partners ARTICLE 2. FORMATION; CERTIFICATE OF LIMITED PARTNERSHIP; OTHER FILINGS; FEES
text: [§425E-118]  Consent and proxies of partners.  Action requiring the consent of partners under this chapter may be taken without a meeting, and a partner may appoint a proxy to consent or otherwise act for the partner by signing an appointment record, either personally or by the partner's attorney in fact. [L 2003, c 210, pt of §1]
